channel.title: My Own Track
channel.description: Yesterday I got bored and I have quite a big backyard, so I made a semi track, I only ride my little brothers 50 out there, because the yard isnt big enough for my bike, I tried riding mine out there... I can't change passed 3rd gear otherwise i go stgraight off the track, I turn the throttle a little and I'm at the next corner :) But it's fun on my little brothers 50.

item.title: My Own Track
item.dc:creator: @g00dg0d g00dg0d
item.description:
@g00dg0d wrote:

I wish I had a bike… and a big yard. Mines kinda big but its full wish trees and fences and stuff.

Read full topic

item.title: My Own Track
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

our yard is like 100m long but only 10-15m wide and there is a pond in the middle. But whe used to have a round track and it whas fun until whe sold our bike. My brother rode into the fence and then the steering wheel was bent but whe got all the money back that whe paid for.

Read full topic

item.title: My Own Track
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

Yesterday I got bored and I have quite a big backyard, so I made a semi track, I only ride my little brothers 50 out there, because the yard isnt big enough for my bike, I tried riding mine out there… I can’t change passed 3rd gear otherwise i go stgraight off the track, I turn the throttle a little and I’m at the next corner But it’s fun on my little brothers 50.
